extends Object
implements org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.binding.api.DataChangeListener

      • readInventory

        public void readInventory()
        Read the Inventory data tree to find information about the Nodes and NodeConnectors. Create the list of NodeConnectors for a given switch. Also determine the STP status of each NodeConnector.

      • getNodeConnector

        public org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.opendaylight.inventory.rev130819.NodeConnectorRef getNodeConnector(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.opendaylight.inventory.rev130819.nodes.Node> nodeInsId,

        Get the NodeConnector on the specified node with the specified MacAddress observation.
        Parameters:
        nodeInsId - InstanceIdentifier for the node on which to search for.
        macAddress - MacAddress to be searched for.
        Returns:
        NodeConnectorRef that pertains to the NodeConnector containing the MacAddress observation.
